638940.name: Jester's Quest
638940.description:
Jester’s Quest is a fairytale metroidvania platformer for a single player with some RPG elements. The main character is a young jester, whose task is to save the princess and, in addition to his journey, help the other inhabitants of this world. The story picks elements from Slovak fairy tales writer Pavol Dobšinský, but also H.CH. Andersen or the Grimm brothers.

FEATURES
✓ Fairy tale metroidvania with some RPG elements
✓ Hand drawn pixelart with frame by frame animation
✓ Open world map to more than 50+ different levels
✓ Medieval fantasy with magic, quests and dragons
✓ You don't have to read a single line of text thanks to IkonTalk feature             
✓ Two buttons combo combat system

Supported using public funding by Slovak Arts Council
